text: This list of Harper's Bazaar Russia cover models is a catalog of cover models/celebrities who have appeared on the cover of Harper's Bazaar Russia, the Russian edition of Harper's Bazaar magazine, starting with first issue in March 1996. ==1990's== {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size:95%; width:100%;" |- !
